entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to valley bottom late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 70 percent chance of rain showers. Snow level rising to 1500 metres in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
